description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 18 lines per page; written in naskh in black on blue and white glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Mild staining on outer edge; a few repairs. Origin: 10 Dhū al-Ḥijjah [1]128 H [25 November 1716] (leaf 201b). Incipit: الحمد لله حق حمده ... سألتهم ايدکم الله املاء مسائل الخلاف بيننا و بين من خالفنا من جميع الفقهاء
author: Ṭūsī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, 995-1067?
abstract: Treatise on Shiʻite fiqh; contains kitāb al-ṭahārah through kitāb al-ṣalāh.
extent: 202 leaves : paper ; 216 x 162 (160 x 105) mm bound to 216 x 165 mm
provenance: On leaf 1a, three owner's notes, two of which are dated 1252 H and 1266 H.
dlme_provenance_en: On leaf 1a, three owner's notes, two of which are dated 1252 H and 1266 H.
creator: Ṭūsī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, 995-1067?
طوسي، محمد بن الحسن، 995-1067?
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Limp black leather with blind-tooled fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
